backend_llm_notes: GPT-5 via Microsoft SilverFlow LLM API - v2 with full GUTT documentation context (same as Claude/Ollama)
original_prompt: Review the materials for my meeting with senior leadership and suggest the best way to summarize the topics into three main discussion points. Generate any objections or concerns that might come up and give me effective responses.

gutts.name: Retrieve Meeting Materials
gutts.capability: Access and collect all relevant documents and resources for the specified senior leadership meeting
gutts.user_goal: Ensure all necessary materials for the meeting are available for review
gutts.evidence: Fetch files linked to the meeting invite and associated shared folders

gutts.name: Analyze Meeting Materials
gutts.capability: Read and extract key information, topics, and themes from the retrieved documents
gutts.user_goal: Understand the content and identify main subjects in the meeting materials
gutts.evidence: Perform semantic analysis to identify recurring concepts and critical points

gutts.name: Generate Candidate Discussion Topics
gutts.capability: List all significant topics identified from the analysis for potential discussion
gutts.user_goal: Have a comprehensive set of possible discussion items derived from the materials
gutts.evidence: Produce a preliminary list of 8-12 key topics extracted from the documents

gutts.name: Rank and Select Top Three Topics
gutts.capability: Prioritize and choose the three most important discussion points based on relevance and impact
gutts.user_goal: Identify the three most strategic topics for senior leadership discussion
gutts.evidence: Apply weighted scoring to select top three topics from candidate list

gutts.name: Generate Potential Objections
gutts.capability: Predict likely objections or concerns that senior leadership might raise regarding the selected topics
gutts.user_goal: Prepare for possible pushback or questions during the meeting
gutts.evidence: Produce a list of 2-3 plausible objections per discussion point

gutts.name: Create Effective Responses
gutts.capability: Formulate clear, persuasive responses to each predicted objection
gutts.user_goal: Be equipped with strong, ready-to-use answers to anticipated concerns
gutts.evidence: Generate concise, actionable responses aligned with meeting objectives
